defaultSeo.title: Awais Nasir | Senior Software Engineer
defaultSeo.description: Awais Nasir is a Senior Software Engineer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

heroData.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true.

aboutItems: Senior Software Engineer based in Doha, Qatar
Extensive experience in developing and leading Web apps, Mobile apps and Server Side Services
Enthusiastic team player who values clear communication, embraces feedback, and is always eager to learn and grow.
Industries worked in: Software Services, Product Based Companies, Deep understanding of the entire Software Development process from front-end to back-end development
Outside of work, I enjoy playing Chess and Cricket, Watching Movies and Reading Books.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resume in the link below.

projects.name: Daleel Aqar
projects.summary: Daleel Aqar, a leading real estate enterprise in Jordan, reached out to me via LinkedIn for expert consultation on building their comprehensive real estate platform, enabling users to buy, sell, and rent properties. I provided end-to-end guidance throughout the entire product lifecycle — from initial planning to successful deployment — leveraging a modern tech stack that included Angular, NestJS, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and AWS, structured within a monorepo architecture using Nx.dev for scalable development.

projects.name: Authentic Influencers
projects.summary: This platform connects Instagram and TikTok influencers with brands for collaboration opportunities. It offers a complete environment where both parties can showcase their pitches, negotiate terms, and finalize business deals seamlessly. The client contacted me via LinkedIn for part-time consultation. I mentored the development team on engineering best practices and successfully led the project through to full deployment on AWS.

projects.name: Performance Reporting
projects.summary: Engineered a user-friendly reporting app that provides stakeholders with clear insights into Afiniti software performance across client environments, using key metrics to improve results

projects.name: WFM
projects.summary: Workforce Management Software is being used in Contact Centers
keyFeatures: Work Plans and Work Plan Rotations of Agents
ETL (export,transpose,load) based Module to load and sync the historical data from Afiniti dbs to Client Environments

projects.name: Visenya
projects.summary: Built Platform to Automate Data Pipelines for AI and Data Integration Teams at Afiniti

projects.name: WFM Historical Connectors
projects.summary: Architected an ETL application to export, transpose, and load historical data from Afiniti databases into client environments, streamlining data synchronization and integration. Fueled product user adoption rate by customizing the app functionality to meet the unique requirements, configurations, and environments of diverse clients. Ran complex data migration initiatives, leveraging advanced SQL expertise and a deep understanding of database transactions to transfer large datasets while maintaining data integrity.

projects.name: Db Utility
projects.summary: Developed a utility service for Afiniti's internal teams which enabled the smooth deployment of database schemas, tables, stored procedures, functions, views, and triggers on both production and staging servers. Managed and safeguarded database server data through robust backup and log tracking functionality, ensuring data protection and preventing system issues.

projects.name: Aduro
projects.summary: Developed a hybrid app using Ionic1 to interface with hardware controllers which enabled remote management of devices such as DHW systems, hoppers, and boilers:
